name: fire-once
description: Javascript library that ensures that an irregularly but frequently event triggered function is fired only once at the given period.

scripts.test_node_imports: node node_modules/jasmine/bin/jasmine.js spec/imports/fire-once-spec.cjs && node node_modules/jasmine/bin/jasmine.js spec/imports/fire-once-spec.mjs
scripts.test_browser: yarn build && node node_modules/jasmine-browser-runner/bin/jasmine-browser-runner runSpecs --browser=chrome && git checkout . && git stash pop

author: Matth√§us J. N. Beyrle <fire-once.npm@mail.magynhard.de>
